recipe.title: Roasted Veg With Nutritional Yeast
ingredients: 2 small heads of broccoli, cut into florets with some stalk attached, or 1 medium acorn squash, seeds removed, cut into 1/2-inch slices
2 tablespoons virgin coconut oil, warmed to liquefy if needed
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F. Toss vegetables with oil on a rimmed baking sheet to coat; season with salt and pepper. Roast until deep golden brown and tender, 20–25 minutes. Let cool slightly, then toss with nutritional yeast.
Do Ahead Veggies can be made 5 days ahead. Cover and chill.
Veggies can be made 5 days ahead. Cover and chill.
